long_description: Lace up your running shoes, pull on the REI Fleet Fitness cap and get out there on your daily run. The hat breathes well to keep your head cool, and it shields your face from rain and sun. Polyester cap features breathable inset panels to help keep your head cool while you're on the go. Polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. REI Fleet Fitness cap has a rip-and-stick strap in back that lets you adjust the fit; 1 size fits most.
short_description: Lace up your running shoes, pull on the REI Fleet Fitness cap and get out there on your daily run. The hat breathes well to keep your head cool, and it shields your face from rain and sun.
